sentences.sContent: the planning and costing of staffing levels
sentences.sCn: 人员配备的计划与成本估算

sentences.sContent: We were asked to prepare detailed costings for the scheme.
sentences.sCn: 我们被要求给这个方案作出详细的成本核算。

words.tran: 不花钱的；无须付出代价的
花费；使付出；使花许多钱
